auth.remove-account.success: We have sent an email on address {email}. To remove your account use the link from the email message.
not-found.message: Content you were looking for does not exist.
password.reset.success: We have sent an email on address {email}. To reset your password use the link from the email message.
sign-up.confirmation.retry: Your account was created but sending confirmation email failed. If the email you entered: {email} is correct please use retry button. Otherwise try to sign up again.
sign-up.success.message: We have sent an email on address {email}. To finish sign up process use the link from the email message to confirm your registration
